name: Cacophony of Cinders
story_text: You tumble through the battle, stabbing foes and teleporting allies.

low.conditions: An enemy takes 6 an ally can teleport up to 3 squares

mid.conditions: An enemy takes 10 an ally can teleport up to 5 squares

high.conditions: An enemy takes 14 an ally can teleport up to 7 squares

effect: You shift up to twice your speed, making one power roll that targets each creature you come adjacent to during the shift.
